original_text: After the Jewish leaders had killed Stephen, the believers had a lot of trouble. The believers left Jerusalem and they went to many different places. Some of them went away as far as Phoenicia, Cyprus and Antioch. They told God's message to people in these places. But they only told the message to Jews.
korean_text: 그 때에 스데반의 일로 일어난 환난으로 말미암아 흩어진 자들이 베니게와 구브로와 안디옥까지 이르러 유대인에게만 말씀을 전하는데

sentences.original_text: After the Jewish leaders had killed Stephen
the believers had a lot of trouble
and they went to many different places
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 여러 다른 곳으로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Some of them went away as far as Phoenicia
They told God's message to people in these places
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이곳 사람들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: But they only told the message to Jews
